Package ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook

Class Summary
AddIngredientsActivity Class that allows for the addition of ingredients to recipes.
ChooseAddFriendActivity  
Constants  
CreateRecipeActivity Class that acts as the controller for the create recipe screen If the current recipe variable in GlobalApplication is set, does not create a new recipe, rather edits the current one.
DBHandler  
EditFriendInfoActivity Class that lets the user edit info of their friends.
EnterFriendActivity Class that allows the user to enter their friend's info.
Friend  
GlobalApplication Class that manages the global application state.
GSONTranslator<T>  
Ingredient  
LoginActivity Class that handles the logging in of a user.
MainActivity Class that represents the main screen of the app.
ManageFriendsActivity Class that allows the user to manage their friends.
ManagePantryActivity Class that allows for the addition of ingredients to the pantry.
NetworkHandler Handles connections to the network and updates/modifies/retrieves and deletes entries from elastic search
NotificationsActivity Class that displays to the user any notifications taht they may have.
Pantry  
Recipe  
SearchActivity Class that allows the user to search for other recipes.
SearchHandler  
SearchUsersActivity Class that allows the user to search for other users.
SignUpActivity Class that allows the user to sign up for our service.
User  
ViewRecievedRecipeActivity Class that allows the user to see a received recipe Acts as a controller in the MVC model.
ViewRecipesActivity Class that is the view recipes screen.
